text: Punnaram is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sasi Shanker, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Kalpana in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/punnaram-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Anchuthengu Raghavan * Kalpana as Chandrika * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Narayanan Nair * TR Omana * Mala Aravindan as Narayanan Nair * Kuthiravattom Pappu as Dr. Vikraman * Mamukkoya as Mahadevan * A. C. Zainuddin as S.I K.K Mathayi * T.P. Madhavan as Eradi * Adoor Bhavani * Remyasree as Susheela * Ragini as Savithri * Kanya Bharathi * Indrans ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Sasi Shanker
title: Punnaram
